item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 8:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Mycoria is an open and secure overlay network that connects all participants (99 points | 42 comments)

3. Ty: A fast Python type checker and language server (709 points | 202 comments)

8. Mistral ships Le Chat – enterprise AI assistant that can run on prem (361 points | 97 comments)
9. Thunder Compute (YC S24) Is Hiring a C++ Low-Latency Systems Developer ( | hide)
10. June Huh dropped out to become a poet, now he’s won a Fields Medal (2022) (136 points | 75 comments)

21. So Much Blood (374 points | 163 comments)
22. Bootstrapping Lisp in a Boot Sector (58 points | 2 comments)
23. Gmail will soon stop support for the 3DES encryption cipher for incoming SMTP (30 points | 36 comments)
24. My quest to make motorcycle riding that tad bit safer (257 points | 288 comments)
25. Wikidive – AI guided rabbitholes in Wikipedia (17 points | 9 comments)
26. I can't understand Apple's Critical Alert policy (22 points | 2 comments)

28. How to Average in Prolog (2017) (60 points | 17 comments)
29. Show HN: eInk optimized manga with Kindle Comic Converter (+Kobo/ReMarkable) (215 points | 44 comments)
30. Ghost students are creating problems for California colleges (89 points | 107 comments)
